name: Minejobs
body:
###Welcome to the MineJobs Homepage!
Yes, that's right, I shamelessly used a website generator instead of making the page myself as I usually prefer to do. Oh well. I'll deal with that later. On to business.

This is where I'll be posting information about MineJobs most frequently. Important updates, upcoming features, etc. I probably won't post things often, but this will be the most frequent place I do post information.

By the way, don't use the buttons on the side there to download the project. They'll download the source files for the entire NetBeans project. If you're looking for a download, head over to [the BukkitDev page](http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/MineJobs), or if you really must have one here, you can nab the latest build out of [the dist folder](https://github.com/eNnillaMS/MineJobs/tree/master/dist).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
